code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import MovieCard from'./MovieCard';import Header from'./Header';import Loader from'./Loader';import{Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{listMovies}from'../actions/movieActions';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const movieList=useSelector(state=>state.movieList);const{loading,movies}=movieList;useEffect(()=>{dispatch(listMovies());},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:movies===null||movies===void 0?void 0:movies.filter(movie=>movie.poster_path).map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:12,md:6,lg:4,xl:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieCard,{movie:movie})},movie.id))})});};export default Home;
